mapper.select: select * from employee_salary_add where staff_id=#{staffId} and time=#{time}
mapper.insert: insert into employee_salary_add (staff_id, "time", basic_wage, post_salary, housing_subsidy, allowance) values (#{staffId},#{time},#{basicWage},#{postSalary},#{housingSubsidy},#{allowance})
mapper.update: update employee_salary_add set basic_wage=#{basicWage}, post_salary=#{postSalary}, housing_subsidy=#{housingSubsidy}, allowance=#{allowance} where staff_id=#{staffId} and time=#{time}
mapper.delete: delete from employee_salary_add where staff_id=#{staffId} and time=#{time}
